text: The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go.
author: Humphrey Bogart

text: I am a liberated woman. And I do believe if a woman does equal work she should be paid equal money. But personally I am feminine and I do like male authority to lean on.
author: Julie Andrews

text: I never left France for Hollywood nor stashed my money in Switzerland.
author: Brigitte Bardot

text: As I have said for many years throughout this land, we're borrowing money from China to buy oil from the Persian Gulf to burn it in ways that destroy the future of human civilization. Every bit of that has to change.
author: Al Gore

text: I had more clothes than I had closets, more cars than garage space, but no money.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
